goals__remit:
L'Associazione Universitaria di Studi Europei (AUSE) was founded in 1989, the same year in which it was launched the Jean Monnet Action. 
The goal of the Association is the promotion of EU Integration Studies in law, history, economic and political science disciplines, following a truly interdisciplinary approach. 
The Association, which represents in Italy over 200 professors and researchers, is member of European Community Studies Association (ECSA-World).
